ROM.Changelog:
## Please flash latest firmware first!
## VertexOS Carbide v3.5 changes: * FINAL Nougat build. Oreo in progress * CAF LA.UM.5.8.r1-02700-8x98.0 tag * LineageOS device tree updates * OxygenOS blob updates * Switch Launcher to @azaidi's Launcher3 * Hide keyboard selector when only GBoard is activated and multiple languages are enabled * UI color improvements for OneplusDoze and Alert Slider menu * Translation imports * Fixed Settings->More crash affecting some users * Fixes for Android Auto * Removed double tap on status bar to sleep (not in line with our vision)
## RenderZenith 011 kernel changes: * LineageOS updates * Will be working with @RenderBroken on new rebase
